faq.question: What is AfCFTA?
faq.answer: The African Continental Free Trade Area (AfCFTA) is a trade agreement to boost intra-African trade and economic integration.

faq.question: How do I place an order?
faq.answer: Browse products, click 'Order Now', fill out the order form, and choose WhatsApp or Email to confirm.

faq.question: Can I trade across borders?
faq.answer: Yes! The AfCFTA platform supports cross-border trade among member countries with simplified customs procedures.
